entry.title: Compatibility Bitcoin-Qt with Tails
entry.summary: The context is a sample terminal output for the latest Tails operating system version 0.23. The user attempts to run the bitcoin-qt command but receives errors, including "Bus::open: Can not get ibus-daemon's address," "IBusInputContext::createInputContext: no connection to ibus-daemon," and "sendto: Operation not permitted." Additionally, the user receives a "Segmentation fault" error when attempting to run the command with a proxy. The user requests a traceback from Wladimir, the creator of Bitcoin.
